EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to The Challenge Society - Reaching Communities introduction evening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering your interest in The Challenge Society's social action programme Reaching Communities, happening in your area next Spring! It's great to hear that you want to stay involved with The Challenge having graduated from NCS!
A launch event for the next wave of the Reaching Communities programme will be taking place on one day during the February 2015 half-term. To secure your FREE ticket to the event, click on the following link and register: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/reaching-communities-spring-2015-launch-tickets-14577538811. The exact date will be confirmed soon.
Want to stay in touch with your mates from NCS? Build your skills and expertise in running a project? Get Â£400 to make an impact in your community? Then come along and find out all about Reaching Communities! There'll be free treats, fun, games and the chance to meet your new team and think about making a difference in your community. Call 07785 623339 or see the attached document for more info!
Best wishes,
Sam
